title: Episode 31 - French Indo-China war 1945-50
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we examine the first part of the struggle for Vietnamese Independence. What was France's strategy in the post war to recolonize Indo-China. How did Britain play a role in starting the Vietnam war  ?  How did America come to aid the French in this struggle and become involved in Vietnam ?
itunes:subtitle: In this episode we examine the first part of the â€¦
